column5: Hey Folks,  Heading to Sarnia, Ontario next weekend and doing some fishing. I've never really targeted CRAPPIE before from LAKE HURON - My question, Do they have 'em? Are they abundant? (say compared to Rice Lake or Simcoe?)... I'd like to target them this weekend... Maybe some Pike too!  Thanks, A2F
Never really targeted them, but I used to catch the odd big one when fishinh for bass in the Ausable river where it goes into Lake Huron,so they are there.
Wicked... Thanks Sudzy!  I wanna target PIKE and some PANFISH this weekend!
